message: Hi Bob, I have a great product for you. I believe it could provide a lot of value. I'm offering it to you for $150. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but $150 is a bit above my budget. I am willing to offer $60 for it. Let me know if this works for you.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $60 is too low for the value of this product. How about we meet halfway at $120? I believe this price is fair considering the benefits you will gain from it.
Hi Alice, thank you for the new offer. I understand your perspective, but $120 is still beyond what I can spend. I can offer $70 for the product. Let me know if this is acceptable.
